Package NameServer

Class NameServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • NameServer.NameServer
  • public class NameServer
extends java.lang.Object
    NameServer for managing the active nodes in the network. All methods are thread-safe.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      NameServer()
      Constructor of the NameServer.

    • Constructor Detail

      • NameServer

        public NameServer()
        Constructor of the NameServer. Loads the info of the nodes stored in the mappingFile.

    • Method Detail

      • getNode

        public java.lang.String getNode​(int id)
        Get the ip address of a node with the given id.
        Parameters:
        id - Node id
        Returns:
        ip address of the node or null if the node is not registered

      • addNode

        public boolean addNode​(int id,
                       java.lang.String ip)
        Set the ip address of a node with the given id (and add the node to the TreeMap if it isn't in there yet). If the node is already registered nothing will change.
        Parameters:
        id - Node id.
        ip - ip address of the node.
        Returns:
        True when the node was registered, false when the node was already registered

      • updateNode

        public boolean updateNode​(int id,
                          java.lang.String ip)
        Update the ip address of a node with the given id. If the node is not registered nothing will change.
        Parameters:
        id - Node id.
        ip - ip address of the node.
        Returns:
        True when the node was updated, false when the node was not registered

      • deleteNode

        public boolean deleteNode​(int id)
        Remove the a node with the given id.
        Parameters:
        id - Node id.
        Returns:
        True when the node was removed, false when the node was not registered

      • getNextNode

        public int getNextNode​(int id)
        Get the id of a node with an Id strictly higher than the given id. Unless the given id is the highest registered id. Then the id of the node with the lowest id is returned.
        Parameters:
        id - Node id.
        Returns:
        Id of the next node.

      • getNextNodeIP

        public java.lang.String getNextNodeIP​(int id)
        Get the IP of a node with an Id strictly higher than the given id. Unless the given id is the highest registered id. Then the IP of the node with the lowest id is returned.
        Parameters:
        id - Node id.
        Returns:
        IP of the next node.

      • getPrevNode

        public int getPrevNode​(int id)
        Get the id of a node with an Id strictly lower than the given id. Unless the given id is the lowest registered id. Then the id of the node with the highest id is returned.
        Parameters:
        id - Node id.
        Returns:
        Id of the previous node.

      • getPrevNodeIP

        public java.lang.String getPrevNodeIP​(int id)
        Get the IP of a node with an Id lower higher than the given id. Unless the given id is the lowest registered id. Then the IP of the node with the highest id is returned.
        Parameters:
        id - Node id.
        Returns:
        IP of the next node.

      • nodeToJson

        public java.lang.String nodeToJson​(int id)
        Get the node as json string. The full node identification is returned. This includes the ip address and the id for the node and its neighbours.
        Parameters:
        id - Node id.
        Returns:
        json string of the node.

      • nodeToString

        public java.lang.String nodeToString​(int id)
        Get the node as string. Note that the string is json compatible but not a full json string.
        Parameters:
        id - Node id.
        Returns:
        String of the node.

      • launchFailureAgent

        public void launchFailureAgent​(int failedNodeId)
        Launch the failure agent.
        Parameters:
        failedNodeId - Id of the failed node.

      • getIpMapping

        public java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.String> getIpMapping()
        Get the mapped ip's
        Returns:
        Mapped ip's

      • getIpMapLock

        public java.util.concurrent.locks.ReadWriteLock getIpMapLock()
        Get lock for synchronized access to the ip mapping
        Returns:
        Lock for synchronized access to the ip mapping
